title: Royal Rajasthan
description: Inspired by the palaces of Udaipur, this collection brings regality to your living room.
story: Echoing the grandeur of the City of Lakes, each piece in this collection is handcrafted by third-generation artisans. We use reclaimed teak from old havelis and inlay it with brass and mother of pearl.

title: Modern Minimalist
description: Clean lines meeting warm textures for the contemporary Indian home.
story: Designed for the urban dweller who seeks unmatched tranquility. This collection strips away the unnecessary, focusing on form, function, and the inherent beauty of natural wood grains.

title: Heritage Weaves
description: Upholstery and textiles that tell a story of ancient looms.
story: We partner with weaver communities in Warangal and Pochampally to create proprietary fabrics that adorn our sofas and chairs. It is not just furniture; it is wearable art for your home.

title: Urban Oasis
description: Bringing the serenity of nature indoors with organic shapes.
story: Soft curves, cane webbing, and planter integration define this collection. It is meant to blur the lines between your balcony and your living room, creating a breathing space in the concrete jungle.
